Text: I have downloaded seasons 1, 2 and 3 succesfully, have seeded all three for a few days each but am having trouble with seasons 4 and 5. There's no progress. Although here on the site it says that there's one seeder here and 2 seeders for s4, my client tells me there are no seeders for either season. What's going on? Why am I stuck and have been stuck for days? Is no one seeding?

Motherfucker! Seeding till we all have around 30 % and then buggering off, leaving us hanging.
You cocksucker!

People, go to http://isohunt.com/torrents/?iht=-1&ihq=twilight+zone+s . There you will find the complete collection uploaded by Ithown. Download that torrent file, redirect it to what you already have (or otherwise use a client with which you can partial download) and go. That torrent is alive and kicking.
